AutoInstall.description:
现有ECS主机是否自动安装云监控插件。取值：

- true

- false

Success.description:
操作是否成功。取值：

- true：成功。

- false：失败。

EnableInstallAgentNewECS.description:
新购ECS主机是否自动安装云监控插件。取值：

- true

- false

400.errorMessage: The specified parameter is not valid.

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "RequestId": "F35654DB-0C9D-4FB3-903F-479BA7663061", "AutoInstall": false, "Success": true, "EnableInstallAgentNewECS": true, "Code": "200", "Message": "The Request is not authorization." }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" false true BA76F154-DE3F-442C-94D3-895E7ABC1BDE 200 true ","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询云监控插件的全局配置
summary: 调用DescribeMonitoringConfig接口查询云监控插件的全局配置。
